solution_line_template: Miranda will have {goose_feathers_total} / {feathers_per_pound} = <<{goose_feathers_total}/{feathers_per_pound}={total_pounds_of_feathers}>>{total_pounds_of_feathers} pounds of feathers from her goose.

Thus, Miranda can stuff about {total_pounds_of_feathers} / {pounds_per_pillow} = <<{total_pounds_of_feathers}/{pounds_per_pillow}={num_pillows}>>{num_pillows} feather pillows after she plucks the goose.
